snippet.title: Soul Reaper - Early Access Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Edit: -See below for update on Mac build-

With a fractured psyche and diminished strength, the Soul Reaper awakens to find any protagonist’s worst nightmare: a depleted inventory. To make matters worse, his emotions have taken sentient form, and are perusing the land with his namesake. Oh, and a nefarious group known as The Midnight Council is planning to destroy everything. Like, EVERYTHING. What a day...

As Warden of The Vault, players will assume the role of the “bone-a fide” (aha, get it?) Soul Reaper. Reap souls to construct your own personal army, and equip powerful loot combinations by scouring the land for treasure. Defeat your impostors to unlock new emotions, and stop The Midnight Council before their ghoulish plans bring an end to reality.

Or, you know. Equip the Romantic Reaper Fragment and just hit on everyone. I suppose that’s always an option...

Soul Reaper launches into Early Access on February 4th, 2020! Check out the Steam store page here! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1163660/Soul_Reaper/

The Mac build for Soul Reaper will now launch a few weeks after the Windows version is made available. For more info, please see our announcement: https://steamcommunity.com/games/1163660/announcements/detail/1697229319591726322

For additional info, swing by our website at https://www.powerlevelstudios.com/ (we even have an official guides section!)

Alternatively, you can stay up to date via our social media! Links down below!
Twitter: https://twitter.com/soulreapergame1
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/powerlevelstudios/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/powerlevelstudios/
Discord: https://discord.gg/erupmSD
GameJolt: https://gamejolt.com/@PowerLevelStudios
Itch.io: https://powerlevelstudios.itch.io/
Dev Blogs: https://medium.com/power-level

#indiegame #RPG #earlyaccess
#soulreaper #gamedev #indiegames2020
